text:
e="preserve">Ann Mitchell (born 22 April 1939) is a British actress. She was born in London. She became known in the 1980s when she starred as Dolly Rawlins in the crime series "Widows" as well as the sequels "Widows 2" and "She's Out".
In 2011, she was cast as Cora Cross in the BBC soap opera "EastEnders". She also starred as Mrs. Warren in "Mrs. Warren's Profession" and her Laurence Olivier Award nominated performance in "Through the Leaves".
